Description: Unique numerical identifier for each record in the history table.
Unique site identifier, sufficient to identify the site within the original publication. Links to SITES and MEASUREMENTS tables.
Unique plot name, sufficient to identify the plot within the original publication.
Area of plot or combined area of replicate plots.

Order of event within the sequence of existing records. This allows determination of event order when dates are missing or events have the same date. NOTE: This field was created after original data entry based on order entered and notes, not in consultation with original publications.

Alphanumeric attributes/ storage type (p: string (mixed upper and lower case letters, numbers, and special characters)
string (mixed upper and lower case letters, numbers, and special characters)

Description: Intensity/frequency/amount applied of history event type, if available.
Percent tree mortality resulting from disturbance. 100% mortality is assumed for slash-and-burn and cultivation.
History event details not included above.
Original plothistoryID, where numbers ²2441 correspond to records released in the first published version of the database (Anderson-Teixeira et al., 2015)
Indicates whether data is from tropical or extratropical regions.
Indicates whether data is from tropical or extratropical regions.
